name: Primary
feeDetails:
UK and EU tuition fees for this course 

QTS only £5960

QTS & PGCE £9250
aboutCourse:
Our mentors within our primary institution are experienced teachers who are enthusiastic about your development and know what is required for you to succeed.

They have designed a thorough programme of teacher training for you that will enable you to learn new skills and forge professional relationships with experienced teachers within the Academy Trust.

Additionally, CPD sessions are run on a weekly basis to ensure that you maintain and enhance the knowledge and skills you need within the teaching profession.
howSchoolPlacementsWork: As part of the teacher training course, trainees will be expected to complete a 4-week placement in one of the Institutions within the Academy trust.
